nodes.text: Carz was a moon in the Svivreni sector of the Outer Rim.
This moon orbited a fluorescent blue-and-white gas giant in the Carz system, an unimportant system most often referred to by its galactic coordinates.
The smuggler baron Yorseg (Yosger) maintained a base on the moon, hidden deep within the rocky crust of the world. The natural ores helped hide the base from sensor scans.
